title: Album, Ornements de l'appartement de la reine au vieux Louvre par le sieur Errard (Adornments in the Apartment of the Queen in the Old Louvre by Sir Errard), ca. 1660
title_raw: Ornements de l'appartement de la reine au vieux Louvre par le sieur Errard (Adornments in the Apartment of the Queen in the Old Louvre by Sir Errard)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Charles Errard was a painter and architect born in Nantes. He worked on a number of decorative projects for the various residences of the French Crown. This album shows his designs for one such project carried out in the Louvre for Queen Anne of Austria, mother of Louis XIV of France. Unfortunately most of the painter's realizations have been destroyed.

tombstone.epitaph: Album, Ornements de l'appartement de la reine au vieux Louvre par le sieur Errard (Adornments in the Apartment of the Queen in the Old Louvre by Sir Errard), ca. 1660. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-289.
